mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT study.*, usertb.user_name, study_category.sc_name FROM study JOIN usertb ON study.user_idx=usertb.user_idx JOIN study_category ON study_category.sc_idx = study.sc_idx ORDER BY study_idx desc ) a ) b WHERE rnum between #{start_num} and #{end_num}
